body.name: Cora Organic Applicator Tampons | Super Absorbency | 100% Organic Cotton, Unscented, Plant-Based Compact Applicator | Leak Protection, Easy Insertion, Non-Toxic (72 Count)
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 15% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 27 mins
features: NEW & IMPROVED: The best-selling organic cotton tampon on Amazon, now even better than ever! Made from 100% organic cotton with a new plant-based applicator and an updated design that expands widthwise for ultra confident leak protection. Packaging may vary.

100% ORGANIC COTTON: Tampons made from 100% certified organic cotton – because what you put in your body matters. Made without pesticides, dioxins, rayon, or chlorine; free of fragrance and dyes. FSA/HSA Eligible.
NEW PLANT-BASED APPLICATOR: Sleek, plant-based* compact applicator made from renewable resources for smooth, comfortable insertion. *minimum 92% plant-based plastic

EXPANDS AND PROTECTS: Gently expands to absorb from all angles for a worry-free, comfortable fit and ultra reliable leak protection –so you can roll with your flow. All absorbencies available for light to heavy flows: Light, Regular, Super, Super Plus, and Variety Packs.

EVERY BODY DESERVES COMFORT: We believe everyone should have access to period care–full stop. So, with each Cora purchase, we provide period products and body literacy resources to people who might otherwise go without.
100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: If you are not 100% delighted by our goods, reach out to us and we’ll make it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Close second to the U by kotex discontinued tampons
reviews.reviewText: U by kotex stopped making the light purple applicator tampons I used for YEARS and these are a close second when it comes the the applicator! I wish the lip/edge was a little wider, but they work pretty well. I have been using Cora and Rael because I have been trying to go more organic and natural with my products. So far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my daughter and myself. They are very comfortable. I don’t experience leakage. I prefer them over non organic. Also a plus being able to use fsa and hsa benefits to buy them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Without giving TMI
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy I came across this product. I had never thought twice about using common brands of feminine products, until one day on Facebook I saw an ad (for a similar product) where they asked women what their hygiene products were made of, then read them the list. I was so surprised. Then I wondered if the tampons I was using could be the cause of my irritation while using them (I had just thought it was hormone-related). Immediately after I started using these, my irritation went away. It was literally instant difference. I’ve been using them several months now, and I can honestly say they’ve fixed my problem. Also, in case you’re wondering, they insert and “wear” just like any big brand of tampon. They don’t have any weird “shedding” like I’ve seen people mention in reviews of other organic tampons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Works great and love that it’s all cotton and that the company gives back to others

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my fave tampons

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fan of Organic
reviews.reviewText: Amazon has the best price for organic pads in bulk so I bought them here. I prefer these pads more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A new found favorite!
reviews.reviewText: I had wanted to switch to an organic cotton tampon for quite some time, but was nervous about the applicator being cheap/flimsy. They’re not. These are awesome! And I swear to God, my periods are shorter since using them. I think it’s true that the national brands put chemicals in theirs that make you bleed more. Oh....AND they have black wrappers! THANK YOU!!! I’ve NEVER understood why they all think we want neon or bright white wrapped tampons in our purses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to their high rating
reviews.reviewText: I am in my forties and it finally dawned on me that the feminine products I use should be organic! Especially tampons!! DUH! I read the reviews for a few other organic tampons and found these had the highest ratings. And now that I've used them I agree! They work like any other name brand tampon I've used. The cotton doesn't fray as apparently others do, I guess. And they do their job perfectly! Im so glad I found them! Here's to another step to minimizing harmful chemicals and toxins so I can have a healthier body!
